Package org.intermine.webservice.server

Class JWTVerifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.intermine.webservice.server.JWTVerifier
  • public class JWTVerifier
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to encapsulate the logic for verifying identity claims as represented as JWTs (JSON Web Tokens).
    Author:
    Alex Kalderimis

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  JWTVerifier.Verification
      The result of a successful verification.
      static class  JWTVerifier.VerificationError
      An error that declares that something has gone wrong when trying to verify a JWT.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static java.lang.String VERIFICATION_STRATEGY
      The strategy used to verify tokens
      static java.lang.String VERIFYAUDIENCE
      This is the key used to establish whether we should verify the audience.
      static java.lang.String WHITELIST
      This is where we get the list of aliases from if the strategy is WHITELIST

    • Method Detail

      • verify

        public JWTVerifier.Verification verify​(java.lang.String rawString)
                                throws JWTVerifier.VerificationError
        Verify this token and return a verification result.
        Parameters:
        rawString - The string representation of the token.
        Returns:
        The verification result.
        Throws:
        JWTVerifier.VerificationError - if this claim cannot be verified.
